info.description:
This API serves the BHLnames app. It locates relevant sections in the Biodiversity Heritage Library that correspond provided names, references or pages. 

Code repository: https://github.com/gnames/bhlnames. 

Access the API on the production server: https://bhlnames.globalnames.org/api/v1.
info.title: BHLnames API

get.description: Gives information where to find docs.

post.description:
Finds BHL references for a name, does not include
references of synonyms.
post.summary: Finds BHL references for a name

200.description: Matched references for the provided name

post.description:
Takes an input.Input with a name and nomenclatural reference
and returns back the putative nomenclatural event
reference from BHL.
post.summary: Finds in BHL the nomenclatural event references for a name.

200.description: Matched references for the provided name

post.description:
Finds BHL references for a taxon, does include

200.description: Matched references for the provided name

get.description: Retrieves the current version of the BHLnames application.

canonical.description: Canonical is a full canonical form of the input name-string.

currentCanonical.description:
CurrentCanonical is a full canonical form of a currently accepted
name for the taxon of the input name-string.

imagesURL.description: ImagesURL provides URL that contains images of the taxon.

input.description: Input of a name and/or reference

references.description: References is a list of all unique BHL references to the name occurence.

refsNum.description: ReferenceNumber is the number of references found for the name-string.

synonyms.description: Synonyms is a list of synonyms for the name-string.

withSynonyms.description:
WithSynonyms sets an option of returning references for synonyms of a name
as well.

refbhl.ItemStats.description: ItemStats provides insights about a Reference's Item. This data can be used to infer the prevalent taxonomic groups within the Item.

itemKingdom.description: ItemKingdom a consensus kingdom for names from the Item (journal volume).

itemKingdomPercent.description:
ItemKingdomPercent indicates the percentage of names that belong
to the consensus Kingdom.

itemMainTaxon.description:
ItemMainTaxon provides a clade that contains a majority of scientific names
mentioned in the Item.

statNamesNum.description: UniqNamesNum is the number of unique names in the Item.

refbhl.NameData.description: NameData contains details about a scientific name provided in the search.

annotNomen.description: AnnotNomen is a nomenclatural annotation located near the matchted name.

editDistance.description:
EditDistance is the number of differences (edit events)
between Name and MatchName according to Levenshtein algorithm.

matchName.description: MatchedName is a scientific name match from the reference's text.

name.description: Name is a scientific name from the query.

refbhl.Part.description: Part represents a distinct entity, usually a scientific paper,

doiPart.description: DOI provides DOI for a part (usually a paper/publication).

partId.description: ID is the BHL database ID for the Part (usually a scientific paper).

partName.example: The choanal papillae of the Cheloniidae

partPages.description: Pages are the start and end pages of a publication.

refbhl.Reference.description: Reference represents a BHL reference that matched the query. This could be a book, a journal, or a scientific paper.

doiTitle.description: TitleDOI provides DOI for a book or journal

itemId.description: ItemID is the BHL database ID for Item (usually a volume).

itemStats.description:
ItemStats provides insights about the Reference Item.
From this data it is possible to infer what kind of
taxonomic groups are prevalent in the text.

itemYearEnd.description: ItemYearEnd is the year when an Item ceased publication.

itemYearStart.description:
ItemYearStart is the year when an Item began publication (most
items will have only ItemYearStart).

pageId.description:
PageID is the BHL database ID for the page where the name was found.
It is provided by BHL.

pageNum.description: PageNum is the page number provided by the hard copy of the publication.

part.description:
Part corresponds to a scientific paper, or other
distinct entity in an Item.

titleId.description: TitleID is the BHL database ID for the Title (book or journal).

titleName.description: TitleName is the name of a title (a book or a journal).
titleName.example: Bulletin of the American Museum of Natural History

titleYearEnd.description: TitleYearEnd is the year when the journal ceased publication.

titleYearStart.description:
TitleYearStart is the year the when book is published,
or when the journal was first published.

url.description: URL is the URL of the reference in BHL.

volume.description: Volume is the information about a volume in a journal.

yearAggr.description:
YearAggr is the most precise year information available for the
reference. This could be from the reference year (part),
the year of a Volume (item), or from the title (usually a book
or journal).

yearType.description: YearType indicates the source of the YearAggr value.

refbhl.ReferenceNameBHL.description: ReferenceNameBHL represents a BHL entity that includes a matched scientific name and the reference where this name was discovered.

isNomenRef.description:
IsNomenRef states is the reference likely contains
a nomenclatural event for the name.

name.description: NameData contains detailed information about the scientific name.

reference.description: Reference is the BHL reference where the name was detected.

score.description:
Score is the overall score of the match between the reference and
a name-string or a reference-string.

refbhl.Score.description: Score provides a qualitative estimation of a match quality to a name-string, a nomen, or a reference-string.

annot.description:
Annot is a score important for nomenclatural events and provides match
for nomenclatural annotations.

labels.description: Labels provide types for each match

odds.description: Odds is total Naive Bayes odds for the score.

oddsDetail.description: OddsDetail provides details of the odds calculation.

pages.description:
RefPages is a score derived from matching pages in a reference
and a page in BHL.

title.description: RefTitle is the score of matching reference's titleName.

total.description: Total is a simple sum of all available individual scores.

volume.description:
RefVolume is a score derived from matching volume from
reference and BHL Volume.

year.description:
Year is a score representing the quality of a year match
in a reference-string or the name-string.
